data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 201,532 who are far from you in Samut Songkhram, Thailand from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Samut Songkhram, Thailand
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Samut Songkhram who will make disciples who make disciples.
Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Samut Songkhram to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Samut Songkhram, Thailand so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Bisu people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Samut Songkhram, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Samut Songkhram, Thailand.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Samut Songkhram who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
